00042 /*************** gly_get_current_working_directory() **************/
00052 const char *gly_get_current_working_directory(void){
00053 char *dirstr;
00054 int sz=250;
00055 dirstr=(char*)calloc(sz,sizeof(char));
00056 while(getcwd(dirstr, 250)==NULL){
00057         if(sz>5000) {mywhine("Unbelievably long (> 5000 chars) current working directory string\n\tfound in gly_get_current_working_directory.");}
00058         sz+=50;
00059         dirstr=realloc(dirstr,sz*(sizeof(char))); } 
00060 return dirstr;
00061 }
